mdRecord.dcterms:description: Erected in what is still known today as the Jewelers Row District, running along Wabash Avenue in the Loop, the structure was originally constructed to house jewelers and silver craftsmen. -- https://www.historichotels.org/hotels-resorts/the-silversmith-hotel/history.php [work]
Converted to a boutique hotel, early 21st century. [work]
